item.title: Exploring CSS Grid Layout
item.description: CSS Grid Layout is a powerful tool for creating complex web layouts with ease. It provides a two-dimensional grid-based approach, allowing for precise control over layout and positioning. Key Features of CSS Grid 1. Grid Container and Items Define a grid container using display: grid and place grid items inside it. The grid container manages the layout of its child items. .container { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr); gap: 10px; } .
